name: atheistically
content:

in a way that relates to atheism (= the belief that God does not exist): If you are atheistically raised, you might be more inclined to consider religion without any particular bias as an adult. The teaching of evolutionary science is not atheistically motivated; it can still encourage wonder at the beauty and complexity of God's creatures.
